welcome_message_body: "Welcome to North Castle, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and is equipped with various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive services and facilities for VIP travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves mostly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport for up to 30 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to the needs of private and corporate aircraft.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport provides access to all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
